attributes.action: Introduce tuition fees in Scotland and for Scottish students and highlight a fundamental flaw in the government's policy making (and ask an unansweable question.)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This may be unpopular with Scottish students but, if we except that there is nothing we can relalisticaly do to convince the government to abolish tuition fees, then the next best thing is to highlight the absurdity of the west loatian question and expose a fundamental flaw in the government's policies. I hope Scottish students who can see the injustice here will sign the petition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
